General.Name: Shenzhen Xfh Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen XFH Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of lithium ion battery cathode materials. Its products are used in energy vehicles, portable power products, electric tools, electric bicycles, and storage power stations. The company is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Building C, Block, Building 20, Shenzhen, China
